description: This file defines a generic asynchronous CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) base class for SQLAlchemy models, providing common database operations with a ModelType parameterized for different models.

classes.name: CRUDBase
classes.description: A generic class providing asynchronous CRUD operations for SQLAlchemy models, parameterized by ModelType which must be a subclass of Base.

methods.name: __init__(self, model: Type[ModelType])
methods.description: Initializes the CRUDBase with a specific model class.

methods.name: Optional[ModelType] get(self, db: AsyncSession, model_id: Any)
methods.description: Retrieves an entity by its primary key asynchronously.

methods.name: Sequence[ModelType] list(self, db: AsyncSession, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100)
methods.description: Returns a list of entities with support for pagination via skip and limit.

methods.name: ModelType create(self, db: AsyncSession, obj_in: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates a new entity in the database, commits, and refreshes it.

methods.name: ModelType update(self, db: AsyncSession, db_obj: ModelType, obj_in: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Updates fields of an existing entity with new values, commits and refreshes it.

methods.name: None delete(self, db: AsyncSession, db_obj: ModelType)
methods.description: Deletes an entity from the database and commits.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^    async def create(self, db: AsyncSession, obj_in: Dict[str, Any]) -> ModelType:$/

ctags.name: delete
ctags.pattern: /^    async def delete(self, db: AsyncSession, db_obj: ModelType) -> None:$/

ctags.name: get
ctags.pattern: /^    async def get(self, db: AsyncSession, model_id: Any) -> Optional[ModelType]:$/

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^    async def list(self, db: AsyncSession, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100) -> Sequence[ModelTyp/
ctags.signature: (self, db: AsyncSession, skip: int = 0, limit: int = 100)

ctags.name: update
ctags.pattern: /^    async def update(self, db: AsyncSession, db_obj: ModelType, obj_in: Dict[str, Any]) -> Model/
ctags.signature: (self, db: AsyncSession, db_obj: ModelType, obj_in: Dict[str, Any])
